column5: with 4lb mono, and my youngest boy nails a 20" smallie like a boss!  Wicked good fathers day!

AWESOME!  That's is one wicked fish for anyone nevermind for a little man with a little rod!!! Good for him!  Dont under estimate little rods.. my daughter has done well with 6-10lb Carp with a 4.5 footer!  Good work Dad!
That's awesome!!!!  Amazing catch!  Now dad...I think he has proven he deserves a nice 6 foot spinning setup!

Thanks guys !  He was almost as proud of that fish as i was of him!  Ccmt, he already has a few spinning outfits, but he always asks to bring that lil spin cast lol. I should also mention he picked the bait, a simple Texas rigged worm with no weight, with 50km/h winds blowing right into our faces lol. The water was so stirred up i doubted we'd catch anything. Guess he proved me wrong!!!!
That's a hulk! What a great way to be proven wrong on father's day! Cheers bud!
